xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="Q}0aH-dm|ck2Xi9*kGbC" x="-62" y="188">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="^(`[SDgs``|@d{`V#B`b">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_button_event" id="UgF6Y|(8YH1WS70HI%[U">
            <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
            <field name="event_">pressed</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="w{R3T,9wuzG3@n[(83wd">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="ES{.4GITot0Q(6|px-]3">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="Y@ZMS]Sh3)]TxvB(HRL-">
                    <field name="TEXT">jack</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="radio_channel_get" id="daiIH}azwQl522bjNWW;">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="po?[yJ1qLDj8P}RUtt0g">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="k7ab.d-_r%j@=G`X2S}*">
                    <field name="type_">1</field>
                    <field name="speed_">2</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="str_">
                      <block type="radio_channel_value" id="O7N@|EC|PdAk+E9kDABS"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="color_">
                      <block type="colour_picker" id="7?g9@m,ul2#f5#aM0{5t">
                        <field name="COLOUR">#00cccc</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="N`{8%R..8HQpjNBtz%}K">
                        <field name="music_">m1</field>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="bit_button_event" id="tH11eg/Oju}QK}65f+KP">
                    <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                    <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="x58_`1DpPk^C#KKEWL2I"></block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="delay" id="Zpq|i7ogpEC4j81*n[H1">
                        <value name="secs_">
                          <block type="math_number" id="7{lW{RDx0pFh3a*{q.Mg">
                            <field name="NUM">2</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
